lines.text: Can I help you?
Well, I...
[Noticing the funeral parlor]
No thanks... Not just yet...
[Walking away]
Thanks all the same.

[Introducing himself]
Tom Lawrence, and I hope you'll forgive my stupid mistake.
I'm afraid I was rather rude.
It takes a very unusual woman to be rude and charming at the same time.

[Curtly]
You use compliments to teach to me, Mr. Lawrence.
[She walks away]

[Referring to the false findings of the inquest]
Dr. Greely wanted to cover this up - not me!
Why?
Well, he didn't think that suicide would sound good for a school like Bluecliff.
How do you think murder would sound?

[Seeing Donovan and Marguerita struggling to get out of a compromising position in a chair]
Timothy, I'm surprised at you!

[Trying to find an excuse]
She broke in here after something.
Did she get it?

[Bewildered]
Search me!
Searching her would be more to the point.

[Heard offscreen, indignantly]
The very idea! Two grown men frightening young girls!
[Then being shown pushing the two cops down the dorm hallway]
Aren't you ashamed of yourselves?

[Protesting innocence]
We didn't do nuthin', lady. We just walked through a door. We're police officers!

[Angrily]
Peeping Toms, you mean!

[Scandalized]
Policemen too - hiding behind your badges!

[Being pushed down the stairs by faculty and students]
Lady, if we had any place to hide, we'd be there!
Yeah!
